short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can recognize phonenumber on the browsing page, and initiate calls over Zonitel Phone System

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
* This extension enables the Click to Call feature. All phone numbers displayed on web sites become clickable.

* When you click on a number, the call is launched directly from your Zonitel office phone or mobile APP.

* Ignore websites you don't want to use the Click to Call feature.

* Login to your Zonitel account to start calling with just one click.

* Zonitel Click to Call extension saves your time and allows you to boost productivity.
